text: Captain Fracassa's Journey () is a 1990 Italian comedy movie directed by Ettore Scola and is based on the 1863 novel Captain Fracasse by Théophile Gautier. It stars Vincent Perez, Emmanuelle Béart, Massimo Troisi, Ornella Muti, Lauretta Masiero, Toni Ucci, Massimo Wertmüller. == Other websites == * Category:1990 comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ettore Scola
title: Captain Fracassa's Journey
